name: Wick Editor Project
summary: A WICK file is a Wick Editor project. It is a Zip-compressed archive that contains the project's assets and a .JSON metadata file. WICK files are used to open projects in Wick Editor and export those projects in .GIF , .ZIP , and/or other formats.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rename .wick to .zip and open with any Zip-decompression tool

images.caption: WICK file open in Wicklets Wick Editor
images.alt: WICK file open in Wicklets Wick Editor
